name: Doi Rui Machh
extraInfo: This recipe goes best with hot rice.

ingredients.name: Green Chillies (Kacha Lanka)
ingredients.quantity: 7 nos. - ground to a fine paste

steps: Wash and cut the Ruhi fish into small pieces.
Heat oil in a pressure cooker and add the smashed cloves, cinnamon and cardamom and fry till smoking.
Add the Ruhi fish pieces, curd, red chillie powder, turmeric powder, green chillie paste, salt, sugar and  some water.
Place the cooker on maximum heat.
When the full cooking pressure is reached, reduce the flame and cook for 3 to 4 minutes.
Open the cooker lid immediately after releasing the steam pressure.
Your DOI RUI MACH is ready to be served.
